Player History
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1965, off Jim Bunning (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1971, hitting .609 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Released by Texas on 8/28/1973...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 8/28/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/12/1974 to a 3-year deal worth $3,350,000 per year...
